text: Roy Owen Haynes (March 13, 1925 – November 12, 2024) was an American jazz drummer. He was one of the most popular drummers in jazz. He was born in Boston, Massachusetts. His career began in 1942. He played swing, bebop, jazz fusion and avant-garde jazz. Haynes died on November 12, 2024 in Long Island, New York at the age of 99. ==References== ==Other websites== * Roy Haynes – Featured Musician (Drummer Cafe) * Drummerworld article * Interview * Concert Review * Interview for the NAMM Oral History Program (2008) Category:1925 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Musicians from Boston Category:American jazz musicians Category:American drummers
title: Roy Haynes
